title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 505.6 - Hours for public inspection and copying
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 505.6 - Hours for public inspection and copying

State Regulations

Requests for public access to records of personal information
shall be accepted and records produced during all hours the authority is
regularly open for business. These hours are 8:30 a.m.-5:00
p.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
505.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
